title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4 renders reveal a familiar design
content:
A new set of renders has been released, showing off the looks of Samsung’s unannounced Galaxy Z Flip 4. Sadly, there really isn’t much to gain from these images, which show us everything, but also show us nothing. The Galaxy Z Flip 4 looks nearly identical to the Galaxy Z Flip 3, just like the recently-leaked Galaxy

The post Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4 renders reveal a familiar design appeared first on XDA.
description: The Galaxy Z Flip 4 is set to make its debut in the coming months and new renders gives us our best look yet.
